Name: Holovid Movie: The Attack Of The Polymer Coated Men
Details: One of the biggest horror movies of the 31st century in the Draconis Combine, The Attack Of The Polymer Coated Man has released by Spreading the Glories Incorporated initially in Kurita space. Its popularity quickly made it be to distributed all over the Inner Sphere despite its blatant anti-Davion and xenophobic tones characteristic of Combine holovid propaganda.
